item.title: Free cloud hosting for developers
item.author: 7nolikov@gmail.com (Dmitrii Novikov)
item.description: As a developer, I usually want to deploy applications with minimal or no upfront investment. The hosting free tiers options give a space for experimentation, learning, and the deployment of low-traffic personal projects or proofs-of-concept without immediate financial commitment.
